item.title: Example Event
item.description:
Slides can be added in a few ways:

  • Create slides using Wowchemy’s Slides feature and link using slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file
  • Upload an existing slide deck to static/ and link using url_slides parameter in the front matter of the talk file
  • Embed your slides (e.g. Google Slides) or presentation video on this page using shortcodes.

Further event details, including page elements such as image galleries, can be added to the body of this page.

item.title: Innovation Office
item.description:
The Innovation Office (IO) of Instituto Curvelo is responsible for coordinating technological innovation and technology transfer activities. Its main activities include:

  • Safeguarding the Innovation Policy of Instituto Curvelo
  • Managing intellectual property assets
  • Identifying and creating opportunities
  • Leveraging resources from national public policies
  • Managing and promoting partnerships

The IO is led by the Innovation Director, Flavio T. J. Pereira.

item.title: Research and Development Center
item.description:
The Research and Development Center (R&DC) is our unit for conducting Research and Development (R&D) activities, which include:

  • Prospecting and executing projects
  • Managing the team of collaborators
  • Establishing the Technical-Scientific Council
  • Establishing, overseeing, and managing laboratories
  • Being directly responsible for processes associated with the management model

Technical-Scientific Council

The Technical-Scientific Council is composed of representatives from the education sector or other research institutes with strong connections to various members of the technological knowledge production value chain. It ensures our relationship with academia and maintains high management standards through the management model.

Laboratories

  • Electronics and Devices Laboratory
  • Manufacturing Systems and Automation Laboratory
  • Information Systems Laboratory

The R&DC is led by the Scientific Director, Filipe A. N. Verri.
